Default greyscale skin
Last Published: 2011-03-20  | Version: 1.0-SNAPSHOT
Parent Project
  • Maven skins

Default greyscale skin

A greyscale variation of Maven's default skin.

The site you are currently seeing is generated using this skin.

Usage

To use maven-default-greyscale-skin as your Maven generated site skin, declare it in the site.xml descriptor:

<project>
  ...
  <skin>
    <groupId>net.ju-n.maven.skins</groupId>
    <artifactId>maven-default-greyscale-skin</artifactId>
    <version>1.0-SNAPSHOT</version>
  </skin>
  ...
</project>
